features.name: Unified Director Agent
features.description: Unified agent for asset audit and intent orchestration, generating structured proposals.

features.name: Sidebar Chat UI
features.description: Interactive sidebar for uploading images, entering prompts, and viewing AI proposals.

features.name: Prompt Compiler & Logger
features.description: Compiles final image generation prompts and logs request payloads for debugging.

features.name: Workspace Sync
features.description: Synchronizes sidebar proposals (prompt, ratio, images) to the main workspace.
